mapper.sql: SELECT b.company_name, b.group_name, a.device_m_id AS eq_id, e.prod_type, e.sim_id, machine_no AS mc_id, e.status, e.op_cnt, e.update_time, e.update_by, e.remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_device WHERE devicetype = 'AA' ) a LEFT JOIN qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_pbox_info c ON c.dev_id = CAST(a.device_id AS DOUBLE) LEFT JOIN qtech_eq_ods.ems_v_code_name b ON a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code LEFT JOIN qtech_eq_ods.ems_t_collector_program d ON c.collector_program_id = d.id RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT COALESCE(a.sim_id, b.sim_id) as sim_id, prod_type, chk_dt, source, status, op_cnt, update_by, update_time, remark FROM ( select sim_id, prod_type, chk_dt from ( SELECT sim_id, prod_type, chk_dt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY sim_id ORDER BY chk_dt DESC ) AS num FROM qtech_eq_ads.im_eq_reverse_control_info WHERE source = 'aa-list' and chk_dt > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ) t WHERE num = 1 ) a FULL OUTER JOIN qtech_eq_ads.im_eq_reverse_ignore_info b on a.sim_id = b.sim_id ) e ON c.pbox_id = e.sim_id
